description:
Learning SAP HCM - Human Capital Management is easy if you have a qualified and experienced instructor who loves to teach.

This course provides a Step by Step configuration of SAP HCM Core Modules.

It is designed to start with a basic overview of the module and end with advanced knowledge of configuration. Our curriculum is carefully designed to exceed job expectations available at a cheaper price with more content being covered.

The Trainer is a Certified Real time Industry Expert with 12+ yrs of experience. He holds experience of working with Top 5 Consulting Companies.
title: Become an SAP HCM Consultant
